name: Mystery of the Lunar Archipelago
summary: Join Alexandra Fortune as she sets out to find her missing grandfather and unravel the age-old mystery of the Lunar Archipelago, a cluster of islands that contains remnants of every great civilization throughout history and hides a treasure of unimaginable worth.  As you guide Alexandra through this thrilling hidden object quest, you'll solve ingenious puzzles, enjoy visually stunning 3D locations and crack a mystery that has the potential to change the world!
